summary: BLOCK 82 Intel Timeline implementation tested - Backend APIs partially working, Frontend loading issues due to service instability

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error when attempting backfill operations

service_stability.issue: Backend APIs become unavailable (503 Service Unavailable) after initial requests
service_stability.symptoms: Initial requests work (200 OK), then service becomes unavailable

ui_bugs.root_cause: Cannot fetch initial data from backend APIs

integration_issues.issue: Unable to test Intel Tab functionality due to dashboard not loading

passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/intel/counts - Returns correct counts (V2020: 2192, V2014: 2191, LIVE: 0)
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/intel/timeline (V2020, 90d) - Returns 40 data points with correct structure
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/intel/latest (V2020) - Returns latest snapshot (2025-12-31, ACCUMULATION, grade D)
Backend Intel Timeline model and service implementation is correct
API routes are properly registered and structured
Data backfill is already populated as expected (V2014: 2191 records, V2020: 2192 records)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix backend service stability issues: 1) Investigate why backend APIs become unavailable (503 errors) after initial requests, 2) Fix POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/intel/backfill endpoint (500 error), 3) Resolve WebSocket authentication issues (403 errors), 4) Once backend is stable, frontend should load properly

success_percentage.backend: 60% (Core read APIs work initially, but service becomes unstable)
